remarks: The neighborhood filter of a nonempty set is generated by its open supersets.  See comments for ~ opnfbas .  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.)
statement:
neifg.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
neifg $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X /\ S =/= (/) ) -> ( X filGen { x e. J | S C_ x } ) = ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) ) $.
$d J x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
